下放運動: (かほううんどう) - Rustication Movement; movement in China in 1957 to get people to move to the countryside
下敷: (したじき) - desk pad/sheet of plastic (or cardboard, felt, etc.) placed under writing paper/underlay; being pinned under/being caught under/being trapped under/being buried under/being crushed beneath; (often as 〜を下敷きにして) model/pattern
下敷き: (したじき) - desk pad/sheet of plastic (or cardboard, felt, etc.) placed under writing paper/underlay; being pinned under/being caught under/being trapped under/being buried under/being crushed beneath; (often as 〜を下敷きにして) model/pattern
下敷きになる: (したじきになる) - to be squashed by; to be pinned under
下敷になる: (したじきになる) - to be squashed by; to be pinned under
下文: (くだしぶみ) - edict from a senior official in government or military which had the status of a binding official document
下方修正: (かほうしゅうせい) - (yoji) downward adjustment; downward revision
下旬: (gejun) - último terço de um mês, do dia 21 até o último dia do mês
下書き: (したがき) - rough copy; draft; draught
下期: (しもき) - second half of the fiscal year
下枝: (しずえ) - lower branches of a tree
下校: (げこう) - coming home from school; end of school day
下様: (しもざま) - lower classes; common people
下欄: (からん) - text at the foot of a page, document, screen, etc.
下段: (かだん) - lower tier/lower step/lower column/lower berth/bottom shelf; low position (of a sword in kendo, etc.)
下民: (げみん) - the masses; the lower classes; the common people
下水: (したみず) - water flowing underneath/one's true feelings; (as in 泰) kanji "water" radical at bottom (radical 85)
下水処理場: (げすいしょりじょう) - sewage (treatment) plant
下水処理施設: (げすいしょりしせつ) - sewage treatment facility; sewage treatment works
下水道: (げすいどう) - drain; sewer; drainage system
下水道管渠: (げすいどうかんきょ) - sewage pipe
下洗い: (したあらい) - pre-washing to combat stains
下流: (かりゅう) - downstream/lower reaches of a river; lower classes
下流域: (しもりゅういき) - lower reaches (e.g. of a valley); downstream sector
下流社会: (かりゅうしゃかい) - lower classes
下湯: (しもゆ) - sitz bath/sitting bath/bath for the lower half of the body; lower pool (e.g. in an onsen)/lower bath
下準備: (したじゅんび) - preliminary arrangements; spade work
下火になる: (したびになる) - to be under control; to burn down; to decline; to drop; to wane
下無: (しもむ) - (in Japan) 5th note of the ancient chromatic scale (approx. F sharp)
下焦: (かしょう) - lower jiao (in traditional Chinese medicine); lower burner
下煮: (したに) - preliminary boiling (of hard-to-cook ingredients); cooking in advance
下町: (したまち) - low-lying part of a city (usu. containing shops, factories, etc.); Shitamachi (low-lying area of eastern Tokyo near Tokyo Bay, incl. Asakusa, Shitaya, Kanda, Fukugawa, Honjo, Nihonbashi, Kyobashi and surrounds)

下町情緒: (したまちじょうちょ) - (yoji) the friendly atmosphere of the traditional commercial and working-class neighborhoods
下町言葉: (したまちことば) - working-class accent or dialect
下界: (げかい) - this world/the earth/hades/the nether world; lower bound
下略: (かりゃく) - remaining text omitted (in quotation)
下痢が移った: (げりがうつった) - infected with diarrhea (diarrhoea)
下相談: (したそうだん) - preliminary consultation; arrangements
下瞰: (かかん) - looking down on; getting a bird's-eye view
下矢印キー: (したやじるしキー) - down arrow key
下種: (げす) - low-life/sleazebag/boor; person of humble rank/humble person/peasant/menial/churl/petty official

下種の後知恵: (げすのあとぢえ) - (proverb) hindsight is 20-20 (even for a fool)

下種女: (げすおんな) - woman of low rank; term of degradation for a woman
下種張る: (げすばる) - to be churlish; to be crude; to be boorish; to be vulgar; to conduct oneself in an unseemly manner

下穴: (したあな) - pilot hole; rough hole; prepared hole
